Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I filmed my contribution to a challenge, where you had to go to Minmus with less than 30 parts. However, less parts are always better, so I decided to go with the minimum, which should be 2 ;-)

I drop the video here, cause I think it turned out quite well, and it's just 3.5 minutes which everyone who's intrested should have :-)
How did your guy bounce while staying straight the first time?
Wow, this is awesome! You had me wondering how you'd managed to only use 2 parts, but then I saw those engines with the merged fuel tank! Kudos!

9 hours ago, superstrijder15 said:

How did your guy bounce while staying straight the first time?

I tried to switch between jetpack mode and normal mode, because I experienced that Kerbals woudld survive impacts better. I don't know if it is a bug and it just works in the transition or  if it's better in jetpack mode generally.

And you may notice that he impacts with 70m/s surface speed which is quite a lot, but the vertical speed is just above 10m/s which is not that much impact force due to the low gravitiy. So it should be at least kerbal realistic haha :-)
Allright, now how about a 3 part return?
